entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0158.10078] The instance contains a fact value using the concept us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent with a value of 15,000 which uses the axis RelatedAndNonrelatedPartyStatusAxis. This axis will be deprecated in the 2024 taxonomy and should not be used in 2023 filings. The filer should use the RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis axis as a replacement. See FASB FAQ 2.19. (https://xbrl.fasb.org/resources/taxonomyfaq.pdf)
The properties of this us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent fact are: Period :2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:RelatedAndNonrelatedPartyStatusAxis=us-gaap:RelatedPartyMember, us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionAxis=irix:TopconAmericaCorporationMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:10078 Rule version: 26.0.9 - irix-20230701.htm 3114

[DQC.US.0158.10078] The instance contains a fact value using the concept us-gaap:AccountsReceivableNetCurrent with a value of 3,500,000 which uses the axis RelatedAndNonrelatedPartyStatusAxis. This axis will be deprecated in the 2024 taxonomy and should not be used in 2023 filings. The filer should use the RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis axis as a replacement. See FASB FAQ 2.19. (https://xbrl.fasb.org/resources/taxonomyfaq.pdf)
The properties of this us-gaap:AccountsReceivableNetCurrent fact are: Period :2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:RelatedAndNonrelatedPartyStatusAxis=us-gaap:RelatedPartyMember, us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionAxis=irix:TopconAmericaCorporationMember Unit : USD

property.name: label
property.value: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
